content: this legal text discusses the division of assets between two individuals mr cg and mr cm the assets in question are two properties located in osimo italy the first property is an apartment on the first floor with a cellar and basement while the second property is an apartment on the ground floor with a cellar basement and a garage the text specifies the size and income of both properties the parties have agreed to divide the assets through a random draw with mr cg receiving the first property and mr cm receiving the second property each share is valued at 135000 euros the text also mentions the importance of adhering to building regulations and the possibility of requesting a habitability certification
